kind_id,
kind_name,
kind_createtime,
kind_updatetime,
kind_xxx,
kind_xxxx,

kind_createtime = #{kindCreatetime,jdbcType=DATE},
kind_updatetime = #{kindUpdatetime,jdbcType=DATE},
kind_xxx = #{kindXxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
kind_xxxx = #{kindXxxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where kind_id = #{kindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_kind set kind_name = #{kindName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kind_createtime = #{kindCreatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, kind_updatetime = #{kindUpdatetime,jdbcType=DATE}, kind_xxx = #{kindXxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, kind_xxxx = #{kindXxxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where kind_id = #{kindId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
